description: This file defines a React context for managing notes state, including CRUD operations, persistence using localStorage, and filtering logic. It provides a custom hook 'useNotes' for consuming note data and functions within React components.

methods.name: uid
methods.description: Generates a random string identifier for a new note.

methods.name: NotesProvider
methods.description: React component that provides notes state and CRUD functionalities via context.

methods.name: useNotes
methods.description: Custom hook to access notes context data and functions.
